name: Nauretria's Forest
description:
This is my first game I've ever created =). You are lost in an abandoned forest chased by Humanoid Creature called Nauretria. Your mission is to collect enough crosses to escape the forest. Gameplay shoud take up to 30min+

!!!Option in pause menu called Full/Windowed is buggy and not finished, it will make game run in Windowed mode but it wont get you back to Fullscreen and sometimes will bug the game.!!!

Minimum Specs Game was tested on:

  • AMD Athrlon 64 X2 Dual Core Processor 4400+
  • ATI Radeon HD 4300/4500 Series
  • 2 GB Ram

Please Report any bugs and glitches in game or with download links so i can fix them!!!
